channel.title: Events on Truthmaker Semantics
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Truthmaker Semantics

item.title: Archive
item.description: The Truthmaker Semantics Workshop Wednesday, December 11, 2019 Amsterdam Science Park, ILLC, Room F1.15 http://projects.illc.uva.nl/conceivability/Events/event/42/Truthmakers-Semantics-Workshop Truthmaker Semantics. Applications in Philosophy and Linguistics Monday, July 29, 2019 — Wednesday, July 31, 2019 Truthmaker semantics deviates from the familiar framework of possible world semantics in two fundamental and related ways. First, the notion of a possible world is replaced by a more general notion of a state that applies to any fragment of a world.
